.. _solverdev:

=============================
Solver Development Guidelines
=============================

.. contents:: Table of contents
    :depth: 9
    :local:

.. py:currentmodule:: popdyn

Development of popdyn numerical solvers must adhere some several loose guidelines related to the structure of
:ref:`species`, :ref:`parameters`, the :ref:`domain`, and :ref:`summary` requirements.

This documentation is in progress, and will be updated on an ongoing basis.
